```{r 1}
vectorA <- c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5,)
matrixA <- matrix(0, nrow = 5, ncol = 5)

for(i in 1:5) {
  for (j in 1:5){
   matrixA[i,j] <- abs(vectorA[i]-
   vectorA[j])
}
```

```{r 2}
num_rows <- 5

  for(j in 1:i){
    cat("*")
  }
  cat("\n")
}
```

```{r 3}
n <- as.numeric(readline("Enter the starting number for the Fibonacci sequence:"))

a <- n
b <- n

cat(a,"")

repeat{
  c <- a+b
  if(c > 500){
    break
  }
  cat(c,"")
  a <- b
  b <- c
}
cat("\n")
```
